# Business Wish

> Free, production-ready Tailwind CSS UI components and developer tools for modern web developers.

Business Wish is an open-source library of **50+ copy-paste ready Tailwind CSS components**, **13 motion/animation components**, and **17 developer tools**. All components support dark mode, are fully accessible (WCAG compliant), responsive, and framework-agnostic (Next.js, Vite, CRA, etc.).

- Website: https://www.businesswish.tech
- GitHub: https://github.com/abhaysinghr516/business-wish
- License: Apache-2.0

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/getting-started): How to install and use components in your project
- [Component Library](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components): Browse all UI components
- [Motion Components](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion): Animated and interactive components
- [Page Templates](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/pages): Full page template examples

## UI Components

Copy-paste ready Tailwind CSS components with dark mode, accessibility, and responsive design built-in.

- [Accordion](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/accordion): Collapsible content sections
- [Alert](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/alert): Notification and feedback messages
- [Avatar](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/avatar): User profile images and placeholders
- [Badge](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/badge): Status indicators and labels
- [Banner](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/banner): Top and inline banners
- [Bottom Navigation](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/bottom-navigation): Mobile bottom nav bars
- [Breadcrumb](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/breadcrumb): Navigation breadcrumbs
- [Button](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/button): Multiple variants, sizes, and states
- [Call to Action](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/call-to-action): CTA sections
- [Card](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/card): Flexible content containers
- [Data Table](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/data-table): Sortable, filterable tables
- [Date Picker](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/date-picker): Date selection components
- [Divider](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/divider): Horizontal and vertical dividers
- [Dropdown](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/dropdown): Dropdown menus and selectors
- [Features](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/features): Feature showcase sections
- [File Upload](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/file-upload): File upload and drag-drop zones
- [Footer](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/footer): Page footer layouts
- [Header](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/header): Responsive navigation bars
- [Hero](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/hero): Landing page hero sections
- [Loader](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/loader): Loading spinners and skeletons
- [Pagination](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/pagination): Page navigation controls
- [Popover](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/popover): Floating content overlays
- [Progress](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/progress): Progress bars and indicators
- [Sidebar](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/sidebar): Side navigation panels
- [Skeleton](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/skeleton): Content loading placeholders
- [Social Share](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/social-share): Social media sharing buttons
- [Tabs](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/tabs): Tabbed content navigation
- [Testimonial](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/testimonial): User testimonial sections
- [Tooltip](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/components/tooltip): Hover/focus tooltip overlays

## Motion Components

Animated, interactive components built with Framer Motion. Install and use in React/Next.js projects.

- [Text Reveal](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/text-reveal): Animated text reveal on scroll
- [Number Ticker](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/number-ticker): Animated counting numbers
- [Card Spotlight](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/card-spotlight): Cards with spotlight hover effect
- [Shimmer Button](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/shimmer-button): Buttons with shimmer animation
- [Gradient Text](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/gradient-text): Animated gradient text
- [Fade In](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/fade-in): Fade-in animation wrapper
- [Morphing Text](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/morphing-text): Smooth text morphing transitions
- [Magnetic Element](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/magnetic-element): Elements that attract to cursor
- [Text Shimmer](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/text-shimmer): Shimmering text effect
- [Word Rotate](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/word-rotate): Rotating word animations
- [Dock](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/dock): macOS-style dock with magnification
- [Split Text](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/split-text): Split text animation
- [Blur Reveal](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/motion/blur-reveal): Blur-to-clear reveal animation

## Page Templates

Full page layout templates ready to use.

- [Error Pages (404)](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/pages/404): Custom 404 error page designs
- [Blog List](https://www.businesswish.tech/docs/pages/blog-list): Blog listing page templates

## Developer Tools

Free browser-based tools for developers â€” no installation required.

- [Tools Home](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools): Browse all developer tools
- [Palette Generator](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/palette-generator): Generate color palettes
- [Contrast Checker](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/contrast-checker): Check color contrast ratios (WCAG)
- [Color Blindness Simulator](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/blindness-simulator): Simulate color blindness
- [Format Converter](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/format-converter): Convert between color formats
- [Image Extractor](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/image-extractor): Extract colors from images
- [JSON Formatter](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/json-formatter): Format and validate JSON
- [QR Code Generator](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/qr-generator): Generate QR codes
- [Box Shadow Generator](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/box-shadow): Create CSS box shadows visually
- [Gradient Generator](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/gradient): Create CSS gradients
- [Flexbox Playground](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/flexbox): Interactive CSS Flexbox tool
- [CSS Grid Playground](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/css-grid): Interactive CSS Grid tool
- [CSV to JSON](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/csv-to-json): Convert CSV data to JSON
- [Word Counter](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/word-counter): Count words and characters
- [Image Compressor](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/image-compressor): Compress images in browser
- [Pomodoro Timer](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/pomodoro-timer): Focus timer with Pomodoro technique
- [Animation Easing](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/animation-easing): Preview CSS easing curves
- [Image Formatter](https://www.businesswish.tech/tools/image-formatter): Convert image formats
